content: **knitted jumper in drops air sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ai-247 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 300-350-350-400-450-500 g colour 03 pearl grey **knitting gauge ** 16 stitches in width and 20 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 60 cm and 80 cm for rib needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
